metadata.title: CVE-2021-30761 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in iOS 12.5.4. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a reportthat this issue may have been actively exploited..

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
